formalpara.title: Configure, compile and install the modules

listitem.para: Install nsoracle (if you want to use Oracle)

screen.action: cd /usr/local/src/aolserver/ ./configure --with-tcl=/usr/local/lib/ make install cd ../nscache make install cd ../nsrewrite make install cd ../nsoracle make install

listitem.para: Install nspostgres (if you want to use Postgres)
listitem.screen: [root nsrewrite]# cd ../nspostgres [root nspostgres]# sudo make install POSTGRES=/usr/local/pgsql ACS=1 INST=/usr/local/aolserver
listitem.para: If you run into problems with libpq.a do the following (and repeat the step above)
If you run into problems with the linker, edit the Makefile. Add -lnsdb to the MODLIBS var.
If the make fails you will have to edit nssha1.c. Comment out the following 2 lines (lines 139-140):
listitem.programlisting: // typedef unsigned int u_int32_t; // typedef unsigned char u_int8_t;

listitem.para: Edit the CONFIG file. Uncomment the instructions meant for AOLserver 4, but edit it to look like this:
Now you can compile and configure tDOM
listitem.screen: [root unix]# sh CONFIG [root unix]# make install

formalpara.title: Add a database-specific wrapper script.
formalpara.para: This script sets database environment variables before starting AOLserver; this allows the AOLserver instance can communicate with the database. There is one script each for Oracle and PostgreSQL. They don't conflict, so if you plan to use both databases, install both.

listitem.screen: [root aolserver]# cd /usr/local/aolserver/bin [root bin]# cp /tmp/&tarballpath;/packages/acs-core-docs/www/files/nsd-oracle.txt ./nsd-oracle [root bin]# chmod 750 nsd-oracle [root bin]# cd /usr/local/aolserver/bin cp /tmp/&tarballpath;/packages/acs-core-docs/www/files/nsd-oracle.txt ./nsd-oracle chmod 750 nsd-oracle

[root aolserver]# cd /usr/local/aolserver/bin [root bin]# cp /tmp/&tarballpath;/packages/acs-core-docs/www/files/nsd-postgres.txt ./nsd-postgres [root bin]# chmod 755 nsd-postgres [root bin]# cd /usr/local/aolserver/bin cp /tmp/&tarballpath;/packages/acs-core-docs/www/files/nsd-postgres.txt ./nsd-postgres chmod 755 nsd-postgres
